contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|kani}} '''Kani''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Geography== * [[Kani (island)]], an island in the Maldives * [[Kani, Burma]] * [[Kani, Côte d'Ivoire]] * [[Kani, Iran (disambiguation)]] * [[Kani District, Gifu]], Japan * [[Kani, Gifu]], Japan ==Other uses== * [[Kani (name)]] * [[Kani (tribe)]], a tribe in Kerala * [[Amiya Deb]] (1917–1983), Indian footballer and cricketer, nicknamed "Kani" * [[Kani (paste)]] (also known as Surimi), a food product made from fish * [[Kani (sushi)]], crab used as a sushi ingredient * [[4265 Kani]], an asteroid ==See also== * [[Kâni]] * [[KANI]] * [[Kani-Kéli]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
